divs: Sighting DetailsFor the past 4 nights, I have seen these star-like objects in the night, they come out anywhere from 9PM-1AM. There are some that reappear in the same places as the previous night, but each night there are more. When I say same places, I mean that it predominantly where they are, but one thing is for sure. They move in U shaped and figure 8 turns, and some even stobe into blue, or red. I have been trying my hardest to find an explanation, but I'm still mystified. I even called the police out, and they have no explanation. Lockheed Martin is not even a half hour away, and they test special aircraft designed for the military. I sure would appreciate any thoughts on this, as it has been a big question for me.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Kennesaw
There were no other sightings in Kennesaw on or around September 27th 2009
Summary: Bright lights that zig-zag and move in circles, slowly.
